EmailTemplate.name: See Account Details
EmailTemplate.subject: See your Account Details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.Name},
Thank you for contacting Bank of Internet USA.
You can view your full account details, including the routing number from within Online banking by following these steps;
1) Click on My Accounts 2) Click on the name of your Account to go into the transaction history page 3) On the right hand side click on "See account Details"
We appreciate your business and commit to delivering value that will make Bank of Internet USA your first choice for all your banking needs.
